ModMetaData.name: Animal Husbandry Raids (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: O Negative
ModMetaData.description:
Update of O Negatives mod for RimWorld 1.1 https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=32653
[img]https://i.imgur.com/GYswkZ7.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/AnimalHusbandryRaids
Added animals for the Empire-faction.
--- Original Description --- Tribals and Pirates like to bring domesticated animals with them when they raid you. Makes factions feel a bit more dynamic, and distracts you from the thought that factions have an infinite human population.
